headline: Adobe (ADBE) CEO Says Stock Undervalued; William Blair Reaffirms Buy
summary: Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) is one of the best stocks to buy according to Citadel LLC. In an October 28 interview with Bloomberg Television, Adobe’s CEO, Shantanu Narayen, stated that the company is trading below its intrinsic value despite robust growth drivers and expanding AI product adoption. During the interview ahead of its Adobe MAX 2025 event, […]

headline: The AI boom is over — here’s your bubble survival guide
summary: Everyone’s asking the wrong question about an AI bubble. Here are the stocks to buy — and when.
